# External Research

Research documents gathered from external sources and analysis.

## Contents

### Architecture & Design Documents

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `ARCHITECTURE_PLAN.md` | System architecture planning |
| `ARCHITECTURE_V2.md` | Architecture version 2 |
| `DATA_FORMAT_REVIEW.md` | Data format analysis |
| `DATA_PIPELINE_DESIGN.md` | Pipeline design documentation |
| `FIRST_PRINCIPLES_ANALYSIS.md` | First principles research |
| `YOUTUBE_SCRAPING_RESEARCH.md` | YouTube scraping analysis |

### Subdirectories

- `documentation/` - External documentation (API docs, SDKs, specs)
- `GitHub/` - GitHub research data and Claude Code analysis
- `YouTube/` - YouTube research data
  - `.template/` - Templates for YouTube research
  - `AI-Improvement-Research/` - AI improvement research from YouTube sources

## Source

- Original files moved from: `deep research/` (root level), Date: 2026-01-30
- Merged from: `research/external/`, Date: 2026-02-07
